definitions.definition: The husband of one's biological mother after her initial marriage to or relationship with one's biological father .
The husband of one's parent distinct from one's biological father or person with a similar relationship.

main_definition: ( in the narrow sense ) The husband of one's biological mother after her initial marriage to or relationship with one's biological father .
secondary_definitions: ( in the broad sense ) The husband of one's parent distinct from one's biological father or person with a similar relationship.
